function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to spatial COVID-19 data for spatial mapping and visualization","Impact":"Ineffective implementation of COVID-19 preventive measures and active case testing","Mitigation":"Seek alternative data sources or advocate for better data access","Technologies":"Geographical Information Systems, spatial mapping tools","People":"Health authorities, public health organizations","Owner":"Health authorities, data providers"},{"Description":"Scalability problems with remote consultations and diagnosis","Impact":"Inefficient handling of COVID-19 cases and delayed medical support","Mitigation":"Invest in scalable telemedicine solutions, optimize network infrastructure","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, network optimization tools","People":"Healthcare providers, telemedicine providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, telemedicine providers"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns with contact-tracing apps","Impact":"Inadequate adoption by the public, hindering effective contact tracing","Mitigation":"Enhance privacy features, address ethical concerns, increase transparency","Technologies":"Blockchain, privacy-focused algorithms","People":"General public, app users","Owner":"App developers, health authorities"}]}
